title: The 500th Episode - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.02.19
description:
Go to http://thirdlove.com/games now to find your perfect-fitting bra and get 15% off your first purchase!

Hurry to http://Upstart.com/KFGAMES to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

Tim and Greg celebrate a KFGD milestone with some Red Dead Online news, Switch coming to China, and microtransactions gone wrong.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:49 - Housekeeping
Canadian National Exhibit! August 16-18! Toronto! kindafunny.com/events
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:41 - Red Dead Online Adding Roles
00:17:16 - Nintendo and Tencent Bringing Switch to China
00:22:55 - GameStop Lays off 50 Managers
00:31:15 - Destiny Shadow Keep Delay
00:34:30 - Out today
00:40:40 - “How exactly will cross-play work?” - WolfThorne7
00:44:11 -  Thirdlove
00:45:45 - Upstart
Reader mail   -
00:49:30 - “How do you feel about the microtransactions being introduced to CTR a month after release?” - maow45
00:53:32 - “It's been almost 3 months since Playstation's last State of Play…” - Fendyy
00:58:33 - “If Microsoft took failed ideas from the original vision of the Xbox One and pitched them at next year's E3 for Scarlet…” - Nintendo Tim
01:02:40 - Squad Up: Will - PS4 - Torbannok
01:03:53 - It’s Our 500th Episode!!
01:11:24 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Greg & Tim
Tuesday - Greg & Rico Ferreira from Geekaholics.com
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Greg & Andrea
Friday - Greg & Tim
